name: Railcar
description:
Drive the train to pick up passengers from the north station and drop them off at the south station.
Swipe up or down to speed up, slow down, stop or send the car in the reverse direction.
The speed indicator at the top shows the speed the engine is operating going at clockwise and anti-clockwise directions.
You can load up to 10 passengers at each stop.
Move as many passengers as you can before the clock runs out while avoiding other trains that are sharing the track.
Transporting sufficient number of passengers will advance to the next level. There are 32 levels.
The track will get busier and speed will become faster and vary as you advance in levels.
Click on (?) for a demo of the game.
